short_summary: Fisheries and Oceans Canada requires the acquisition of forklift trucks and ancillary items, including a delivery date of March 31, ??. This solicitation is open to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request (RFSA) E60HS-21FRKL/A.
description: The department of Oceans and Fisheries has a requirement for six (6) forklifts Group 1A - propane engine driven forklift trucks configuration B. As a requirement of the SA, this notice is published on Buyandsell.gc.ca for a period of fifteen (15) calendar days. The requested delivery date for the above-mentioned goods is March 31 2025.
full_summary:
# Forklift Trucks and Ancillary Items Tender Notice
## Solicitation Reference Number
30005720

## Procurement Category
 Goods and Services (GD)

## Notice Type
 Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement

## Procurement Method
Competitive - Selective Tendering

## Description
Fisheries and Oceans Canada requires six (6) forklift trucks, Group 1A, propane engine driven, configuration B, and associated items. The delivery date is expected to be on or before March 31, 2025.

## Eligible Suppliers
This solicitation is open only to suppliers who hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HS-21FRKL/A. Suppliers wishing to become pre-qualified under this RFSA should consult [link to RFSA pre-qualification process](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HS-653-79868).

## Tender Documents
Tender documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP) and any addenda, can be accessed through the [Buy and Sell Government Contracts](https://buyandsell.gc.ca) website. Suppliers are responsible for ensuring they have the most up-to-date version of the solicitation documents.

## Contact Information
Contact:
Carina Della Valle
Email: [Carina.DellaValle@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:Carina.DellaValle@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
Phone: 343-542-9691

## Tender Closing Date
Tenders must be submitted by 14:00 (2:00 PM) on May 29, 2024.

## Trade Agreements
This solicitation is subject to the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA).
